pull.title: sendall: check if the maxtxfee has been exceeded
pull.body: Previously the `sendall` RPC didn't check whether the fees of the transaction it creates exceed the set `maxtxfee`. This PR adds this check to `sendall` and a test case for it.

events.message: sendall: check if the maxtxfee has been exceeded
